<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Scouring Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=1124)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 94

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 10-foot radius, 60-foot-tall cylinder

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You inundate the area with concentrated positive energy, which scours away the stain of undeath. Each creature in the area takes 6d8 positive damage and must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. Creatures that fail the save also take 1d8 [persistent positive damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). Creatures that take persistent positive damage from _scouring pulse_ are wreathed in a heatless halo of light. They emit bright light in a 5-foot radius preventing them from being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4); if the creature is [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), they're concealed while affected by scouring pulse, rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

---
**Heightened (8th)**  The positive damage increases to 9d8 damage, and the persistent positive damage increases to 2d8. Creatures remain suffused in light for 1d4 additional rounds after removing the persistent positive damage.
name: Scouring Pulse
